name: Heimval
description:
Heimval was made by me for 7DRL in 7 days on top of some of my previous work on a global illumination lighting system built in Godot.

It is quite expensive on the GPU, so I apologise if the game runs slow for you.

While in game, pressing ESC will bring up a list of controls.

Links
  • Follow me on Twitter.
  • Music by Hinterheim.
  • SFX from ZapSplat.com
